name: Signpost 1
Dialogue:
New SILPH SCOPE! Make the Invisible Plain to See! 
SILPH CO.

name: Signpost 2
Dialogue:
May the Souls of POKEMON Rest Easy 
POKEMON TOWER

GHOSTs appeared in POKEMON TOWER. I think they're the spirits of 
POKEMON that the ROCKETs killed.

This town is known as the grave site of POKEMON. Memorial services
are held in POKEMON TOWER.
Do you believe in GHOSTs?

Hahaha, I guess not. That white hand on your shoulder,
it's not real.
Really? So there are believers...

name: Center 1
Dialogue: I saw CUBONE's mother die trying to escape from TEAM ROCKET!

name: Center 2
Dialogue: CUBONEs wear skulls, right? People will pay a lot for one!

name: Center 3
Dialogue: TEAM ROCKET will do anything for the sake of gold!

name: Mart 4
Dialogue:
I'm searching for items that raise the abilities of POKEMON
during a single battle. X ATTACK, X DEFEND, X SPEED and X SPECIAL
are what I'm after. Do you know where I can get them?

name: Mart 5
Dialogue: You know REVIVE? It revives any fainted POKEMON!

name: Booklet
Dialogue:
POKEMON Monthly Grand Prize Drawing!
The application form is... Gone! It's been clipped out!
That's odd, MR.FUJI isn't here. Where'd he go?

name: 6 after
Dialogue: MR.FUJI had been praying alone for CUBONE's mother.

This is really MR.FUJI's house. He's really kind! He looks after
abandoned and orphaned POKEMON!

name: 7 after
Dialogue: It's so warm! POKEMON are so nice to hug!

name: Psyduck
Dialogue: Gwappa!

name: Nidorino
Dialogue: Gaoo!

I hate those horrible ROCKETs! That poor CUBONE's mother...
It was killed trying to escape from TEAM ROCKET!

name: 8 after
Dialogue:
The GHOST of POKEMON TOWER is gone! Someone must have soothed its
restless soul!

name: Cubone
Dialogue: Kyarugoo!

name: Name Rater
Dialogue:
Hello, hello! I am the official NAME RATER! Want me to rate the 
nicknames of your POKEMON?
Fine! Come any time you like!
Which POKEMON should I look at?

name: Tower 1
Dialogue: POKEMON TOWER was erected in the memory of POKEMON that had died.

name: Tower 2
Dialogue: I came to pray for my CLEFAIRY. Sniff! I can't stop crying...

name: Tower 3
Dialogue: Did you come to pay respects? Bless you!

name: Tower 4
Dialogue: My GROWLITHE... Why did you die?

name: Tower 5
Dialogue: I am a CHANNELER! There are spirits up to mischief!

name: Tower 6
Dialogue:
Even we could not identify the wayward GHOSTs! A SILPH SCOPE might
be able to unmask them.

name: Rival_Fight
Dialogue:
Hey, Player! What brings you here? Your POKEMON don't look dead!
I can at least make them faint! Let's go, pal!

name: Rival_Fight after
Dialogue:
How's your POKEDEX coming, pal? I just caught a CUBONE! I can't
find the grown-up MAROWAK yet! I doubt there are any left!
Well, I better get going! I've got a lot to accomplish, pal!
Smell ya later!

name: Tower 7
Dialogue:
Come, child! I sealed this space with white magic! You can rest
here!

name: Trainer 1
Dialogue: Urrg...Awaa...Huhu...graa..

name: Trainer 1 after
Dialogue: The GHOSTs can be identified by the SILPH SCOPE.

name: Trainer 2
Dialogue: Be gone! Evil spirit!

name: Trainer 2 after
Dialogue: My friends were possessed too!

name: Trainer 3
Dialogue: Kekeke.... Kwaaah!

name: Trainer 3 after
Dialogue: Sorry! I was possessed!

name: Trainer 4
Dialogue: Be cursed with me! Kwaaah!

name: Trainer 4 after
Dialogue: We can't crack the identity of the GHOSTs.

name: Trainer 5
Dialogue: Huhuhu... Beat me not!

name: Trainer 5 after
Dialogue: May the departed souls of POKEMON rest in peace...

name: Trainer 6
Dialogue: GHOST! No! Kwaaah!

name: Trainer 6 after
Dialogue: I must have been dreaming...

name: Trainer 7
Dialogue: You...shall...join...us...

name: Trainer 7 after
Dialogue: I was possessed!

name: Trainer 8
Dialogue: Give...me...your...soul...

name: Trainer 8 after
Dialogue: I was under possession!

name: Trainer 9
Dialogue: Zombies!

name: Trainer 9 after
Dialogue: I regained my senses!

name: Trainer 10
Dialogue: Urgah... Urff...

name: Trainer 10 after
Dialogue: I fell to evil spirits despite my training!

name: Trainer 11
Dialogue: Give...me...blood...

name: Trainer 11 after
Dialogue: I feel anemic and weak...

name: Trainer 12
Dialogue: Ke...ke...ke...ke...ke...ke!!

name: Trainer 12 after
Dialogue: What's going on here?

name: Trainer 13
Dialogue: Urff... Kwaah!

name: Trainer 13 after
Dialogue: Hair didn't fall out! It was an evil spirit!

name: Trainer 14
Dialogue: What do you want? Why are you here?

name: Trainer 14 after
Dialogue: I'm not going to forget this!

name: Trainer 15
Dialogue:
This old guy came and complained about us harming useless
POKEMON! We're talking it over as adults!

name: Trainer 15 after
Dialogue: POKEMON are only good for making money! Stay out of our business!

name: Trainer 16
Dialogue: You're not saving anyone, kid!

name: Trainer 16 after
Dialogue: You're not getting away with this!

name: Fuji
Dialogue:
Heh? You came to save me? Thank you. But, I came here of my own
free will. I came to calm the soul of CUBONE's mother. I think
MAROWAK's spirit has gone to the afterlife. I must thank you for
your kind concern! Follow me to my home, POKEMON HOUSE at the
foot of this tower.

name: Fuji2
Dialogue:
Player. Your POKEDEX quest may fail without love for your POKEMON.
I think this may help your quest.
You must make room for this!

Upon hearing POKE FLUTE, sleeping POKEMON will spring awake.
It works on all sleeping POKEMON.

name: Fuji2 after
Dialogue: Has my FLUTE helped you?

name: Ghost
Dialogue: Be gone... Intruders...
